1.content:
(A figure obscured in shadow is seen being thrown by something also covered in shadow.)

?????????:(Laughs evily) "You're out of your element, Rider!"

Figure: (tries to stand up, but staggers up on one knee.) "That may be, but...." (Raises fist) "I still have enough strength to kill you!" (Jumps up) "Rider KIIIIIIIICK!"

(As the two beings are about to connect with one another.......)


???: "Wah!"

(A girl falls out of bed.)

(She winces in pain in her noggin as she holds it.) "Man, that smarts!"

*I'll finish the rest of the chapter later.*

The Thing
1.title: Chapter 1.1: "Was it a Dream?"

info.brief_description: This is my take on the Kamen Rider mythos. Read and review!
info.description:
I've recently watched Kamen Rider. this is my own take on the franchise, so if you don't like my ideas, please keep them to yourself. With that out of the way, Enjoy!



The year is 2018.

With the increase of both humanity and the advances in science, most people forget the fact that science was originally based on myth and legends. Without any proof, this is what humanity think of the past: myths and legends. Alas, if only that were true.

Enter the Megiddo, an ancient race of Youkai that have started their war on humanity. They have not already taken killed some popular politicians, they wear their skin(so to speak), and masquerade as them.
Their top commanders are Ender Beasts, Youkai that have adapted in this world of science by modifying their own bodies to be bio-mechanical. Without a new Hero of Justice, this world shall to them.


Main characters:

Eve Willows
A 18-year old girl born and raised in America. Somewhat spunky, she can handle herself in a fight.
Introduced in: "Chapter 1.1: "Was it a Dream?"
